name: Madam Phantom
description:
A short 2 player game where a madam gets help from an invisible phantom. Certain objects are only visible by the ghost so it's their job to guide the madam to the exit.

This game is only playable via local network multiplayer (Radmin/Hamahci etc also works).

Controls:

AWSD - Movement

E - Throw keys

Esc - Open exit menu

Developed by:

Gabriel Teixeira - Programming and Music

Caroline Santos - Art
